title: KPMG's Mayor Expects Oil Glut to Continue
description: KPMG's Regina Mayor expects the global oil glut to continue in 2026. She sees a structural oversupply in the global market. OPEC+ members meeting this weekend are expected to stick with plans to pause further supply hikes amid growing evidence of a global surplus, according to three delegates. (Source: Bloomberg)
